name: lick
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.black-white: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
